data.title: Moovijob Day Luxembourg, the Job and career development fair enables you to meet companies hiring now in Luxembourg
data.meta_description: All info about Moovijob Day Luxembourg 2025. Find the official guide of the fair, practical information, list of exhibitors and job offers.
data.text:
Luxembourg's largest job, training and career fair continues to make an impression!

Launched in 2011 by your job board Moovijob.com, the Moovijob Day Luxembourg is back in 2025. This fair is open to everyone and offers you the opportunity to talk face-to-face with the key players of the labour market of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. You will also have the opportunity to attend free conferences covering a wide variety of topics.

Are you looking for an internship, a job, a training or do you simply want to get information about the Luxembourg labour market and receive advice?

Are you already working but would like to keep a close eye on the development of your profession and your sector?

Then don't miss this day and join this unique event in the Grand Duchy!

Registration for the fair is not mandatory, but recommended.

We look forward to welcoming you!
